backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixin, access control, maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, and activity tracking, plus type definitions for all entities.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence for pond rank display, including involved files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing layouts, pages, and UI behaviors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, favicon, root div, and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks hook to add or remove bookmarks for a lily.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, metadata, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Displays emoji reaction buttons with counts and hover/selection interactions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution including a heart icon and caffeine.ai link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with search, mobile menu, create dropdown, and avatar handling with search recording.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, main outlet, and mobile sidebar drawer with auto-close on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the left navigation sidebar with route-aware highlighting and recent activity items. Supports mobile drawer mode and fetches recent lilies for quick access.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with avatar, metadata, image, and interaction controls like likes, shares, and bookmarks. Fetches counts and user/pond data dynamically.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Shows an image in a fixed 4:3 frame, adding a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images. Handles aspect‑ratio detection and optional click behavior.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Implements a slide‑in mobile drawer containing the LeftSidebar and disables body scroll while open. Includes overlay scrim and transition effects.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Displays pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls. Fetches pond info and membership state and handles join/leave mutations with toasts.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Provides a join button for pond cards, handling join mutations and preventing navigation. Shows joined or loading states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders the mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation. Adapts visuals for feed vs. about views.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Shows a post with voting controls, metadata, preview content, image, and tag. Links to the post page and supports optional upvote/downvote callbacks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit on their profile with avatar, timestamp, comment preview, and link to the related lily.
Provides a popover emoji picker allowing users to insert preset emojis into ribbits.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a ribbit with avatar, content, likes, replies, and nested threading with reply and like interactions.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder and transitions smoothly once fully loaded.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Shows trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using fetched data with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with input handling and selection support.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown showing trending searches or query-based suggestions and allows selecting a term.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts using reusable sidebar modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled tab list and trigger components with underline-based visual styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state and exposing login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a media query matches and updates state on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for ponds, posts, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode settings, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notations like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side utility to validate, resize, and compress images, with GIF animation detection and canvas-based recompression.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Functions to validate, normalize, and generate error messages for alphanumeric-only pond names.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name to produce deterministic rank mappings.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric-only tags and provides error messages for invalid ones.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, usernames, Froggy Phrase storage, and settings backup in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using timestamps stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the Ribbit About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with ranks, join controls, loading states, and navigation to pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form page for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including tag suggestions, pond selection, image compression, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: UI for creating a new pond with name validation, description, optional phrase, and compressed banner/profile image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Page to create a post of type text, image, or link with pond selection, optional tag, image compression, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with avatar, stats, and tabs for posts and comments, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing lilies sorted by trending or new, with search integration and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a lily post, handles ribbit creation, view count increments, likes, and image lightbox.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond details including moderators, visibility, creation date, and allows leaving the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s lily feed with sorting, membership checks, and join functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Renders a single post with comments, images, metadata, and allows adding new comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists user‑bookmarked lilies stored locally, with loading states and removal options.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with stats and navigation to individual tag pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a given tag with canonical-tag redirection and sorting controls.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Implements user settings including username changes, profile editing, avatar upload, pond management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versions, existing features, and pending feature requests.
